comment.author: 22025373@N00
comment._content:
Taken facing west along New Chambers St., at roughly the location where the current Chambers and Monroe Streets would intersect if they were extended.

Now the location of the Governor Alfred E. Smith housing projects, built in 1953.

The El is visible at about where Pearl St. becomes St. James Place.

comment.author: 49005669@N00
comment._content: Always loved this photo.  The Scott's Emulsio building, is approximately where the ex-Verizon building is located.  375 Pearl Street..
